card.name: Abbey Gargoyles
card.property: Flying, protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though Serra has not been seen for twenty years, her Gargoyles still watch over our city and punish the guilty." —Gulsen, Abbey Matron

card.name: Abbey Matron
card.property: {W}, {T}: Abbey Matron gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Matrons are kindly souls, but don't ask one for an ale." —Halina, Dwarven Trader

card.name: Abbey Matron
card.property: {W}, {T}: Abbey Matron gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Matrons still say Serra is coming back. I bet she never even existed." —Murat, Death Speaker

card.name: Aether Storm
card.property: Creature spells can't be cast. Pay 4 life: Destroy Aether Storm. It can't be regenerated. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do love the rain . . . but this storm feels somehow wrong, Taysir." —Daria

card.name: Aliban's Tower
card.property: Target blocking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who hide in hollow towers would do well to remember the rain." —Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

card.name: Aliban's Tower
card.property: Target blocking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The people of Aysen built their roads with stones from these wonders. Aliban would be pleased with their ingenuity." —Baki, Wizard Attendant

card.name: Ambush
card.property: Blocking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't these goons have anything better to do?" —Joskun, An-Havva Constable

card.name: Ambush Party
card.property: First strike, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Call it a cost of doing business. The best way to protect against thieves is to hire better thieves." —Eron the Relentless

card.name: Ambush Party
card.property: First strike, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The roads to Koskun Keep are mostly safe these days. Mostly." —Joskun, An-Havva Constable

card.name: An-Havva Constable
card.property: An-Havva Constable's toughness is equal to 1 plus the number of green creatures on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Joskun and the other Constables serve with passion, if not with grace." —Devin, Faerie Noble

card.name: An-Havva Inn
card.property: You gain X plus 1 life, where X is the number of green creatures on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Inn was ever a steady source of good cheer and kindness. Greatly do I miss it, now that I am gone." —Ihsan's Shade

card.name: An-Havva Township
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Folk of good heart will always find a home.

card.name: An-Zerrin Ruins
card.property: As An-Zerrin Ruins enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures of the chosen type don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The An-Zerrins have served me well, ever since I first killed them." —Baron Sengir

card.name: Anaba Ancestor
card.property: {T}: Another target Minotaur creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Ancestors are the wisdom of the tribe and the soul of the Homelands. I am eternally in their debt." —Taysir

card.name: Anaba Bodyguard
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not someone to pick a fight with, unless you're fond of pain." —Halina, Dwarven Trader

card.name: Anaba Bodyguard
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not all Minotaurs are tribal. Some are freelance." —Eron the Relentless

card.name: Anaba Shaman
card.property: {R}, {T}: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Shamans? Ha They are mere craven cows not capable of true magic." —Irini Sengir

card.name: Anaba Shaman
card.property: {R}, {T}: Anaba Shaman deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Few master the powers of the earth as well as do the Shamans of the Minotaurs." —Baki, Wizard Attendant

card.name: Anaba Spirit Crafter
card.property: Minotaur creatures get +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Spirit Crafters sing of all our people. They sing of those lost, of those found, and of those who are yet to be." —Onatah, Anaba Shaman

card.name: Apocalypse Chime
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Apocalypse Chime: Destroy all nontoken permanents with a name originally printed in the Homelands expansion. They can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One day, or another, perhaps I shall ring my pretty chime . . . loudly, so that all may hear." —Grandmother Sengir

card.name: Autumn Willow
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) {G}: Until end of turn, Autumn Willow can be the target of spells and abilities controlled by target player as though it didn't have shroud.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must shake her limbs and rattle her brains." —Grandmother Sengir

card.name: Aysen Abbey
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Serra's gift to her people: a symbol of faith and hope.

card.name: Aysen Bureaucrats
card.property: {T}: Tap target creature with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would say that our Bureaucrats are no better than vipers—but I shouldn't insult the vipers." —Murat, Death Speaker

card.name: Aysen Bureaucrats
card.property: {T}: Tap target creature with power 2 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the tortures of my vault of horrors pale in comparison to dealing with those petty Bureaucrats." —Baron Sengir

card.name: Aysen Crusader
card.property: Aysen Crusader's power and toughness are each equal to 2 plus the number of Soldiers and Warriors you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A renegade rallying the rabble does not a true Crusader make." —Irini Sengir

card.name: Aysen Highway
card.property: White creatures have plainswalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Plains.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tread the roads of righteousness, Murat, lest you lose your way and be consumed." —Baris, Serra Inquisitor

card.name: Baki's Curse
card.property: Baki's Curse deals 2 damage to each creature for each Aura attached to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who fling spells too quickly should have reason to regret it." —Baki, Wizard Attendant

card.name: Baron Sengir
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Baron Sengir this turn dies, put a +2/+2 counter on Baron Sengir. {T}: Regenerate another target Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beast. Defiler. The source of all my pain." —Ihsan's Shade

card.name: Beast Walkers
card.property: {G}: Beast Walkers gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Beast Walkers do a great service to Aysen. As humans or as beasts, their heart is yet to Serra true." —Baris, Serra Inquisitor

card.name: Black Carriage
card.property: Trample Black Carriage doesn't untap during your untap step. Sacrifice a creature: Untap Black Carriage. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Broken Visage
card.property: Destroy target nonartifact attacking creature. It can't be regenerated. Create a black Spirit creature token. Its power is equal to that creature's power and its toughness is equal to that creature's toughness. Sacrifice the token at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Carapace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2. Sacrifice Carapace: Regenerate enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tougher to crack, the sweeter the snack." —Kakra, Sea Troll

card.name: Carapace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+2. Sacrifice Carapace: Regenerate enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now, that's a fashion statement." —Devin, Faerie Noble

card.name: Castle Sengir
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where hope has no champion, evil rules all.

card.name: Cemetery Gate
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Protection from black

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It keeps some out, yes. It also keeps others in" —Grandmother Sengir

card.name: Cemetery Gate
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Protection from black

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just the place for a picnic." —Murat, Death Speaker

card.name: Chain Stasis
card.property: You may tap or untap target creature. Then that creature's controller may pay {2}{U}. If the player does, he or she may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

card.name: Chandler

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never brag about the latest wonder you've created, students. Chandler might be listening." —Reveka, Wizard Savant

card.name: Clockwork Gnomes
card.property: {3}, {T}: Regenerate target artifact creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Until I came to the Floating Isle, I never had to oil the servants." —Baki, Wizard Attendant

card.name: Clockwork Steed
card.property: Clockwork Steed enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it. Clockwork Steed can't be blocked by artifact creatures. At end of combat, if Clockwork Steed attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Steed to be greater than four. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Clockwork Swarm
card.property: Clockwork Swarm enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it. Clockwork Swarm can't be blocked by Walls. At end of combat, if Clockwork Swarm attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it. {X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Swarm. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Swarm to be greater than four. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Coral Reef
card.property: Coral Reef enters the battlefield with four polyp counters on it. Sacrifice an Island: Put two polyp counters on Coral Reef. {U}, Tap an untapped blue creature you control, Remove a polyp counter from Coral Reef: Put a +0/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Dark Maze
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {0}: Dark Maze can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stray not into the path of darkness, or be lost forever." —Baki, Wizard Attendant

card.name: Dark Maze
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {0}: Dark Maze can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The path of faith is fortunately fraught with failure." —Irini Sengir

card.name: Daughter of Autumn
card.property: {W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target white creature this turn is dealt to Daughter of Autumn instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who say that Serra is dead have never met the Autumn Willow's daughters. They are as kind and as generous as Serra would wish us to be." —Gulsen, Abbey Matron

card.name: Death Speakers
card.property: Protection from black

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Such innocent little birds. They sing a sweet song, sitting on their fragile branch." —Grandmother Sengir

card.name: Didgeridoo
card.property: {3}: You may put a Minotaur permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Play the song of he who delivered us. Play the song of Feroz." —Onatah, Anaba Shaman

card.name: Drudge Spell
card.property: {B}, Exile two creature cards from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token. It has "{B}: Regenerate this creature." When Drudge Spell leaves the battlefield, destroy all Skeleton tokens. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Dry Spell
card.property: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My soul thirsts for Serra's salvation, as does my body for life's breath." —Ihsan's Shade

card.name: Dry Spell
card.property: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wherever water is lacking, all things suffer." —Autumn Willow

card.name: Dwarven Pony
card.property: {1} {R}, {T}: Target Dwarf creature gains mountainwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hear Halina's got a pony that can count to six—and likes to eat meat." —Chandler

card.name: Dwarven Sea Clan
card.property: {T}: Choose target attacking or blocking creature whose controller controls an Island. Dwarven Sea Clan deals 2 damage to that creature at end of combat. Activate this ability only before the end of combat step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No dwarf alive can best one of my crew dead." —Zeki, Reef Pirate

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their definition of 'fair profit' is certainly novel." —Reveka, Wizard Savant

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They wouldn't sell their own families—at least, not for cheap." —Zeki, Reef Pirate

card.name: Ebony Rhino
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That Rhino would fetch us a tidy sum, Joven. Perhaps it's time to make it ours." —Chandler

card.name: Eron the Relentless
card.property: Haste {R}{R}{R}: Regenerate Eron the Relentless.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eron would be much less of a hassle if only he were mortal." —Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

card.name: Evaporate
card.property: Evaporate deals 1 damage to each white and/or blue creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The body is a temple with a foundation of sand." —Autumn Willow

card.name: Faerie Noble
card.property: Flying Other Faerie creatures you control get +0/+1. {T}: Other Faerie creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faeries talk all in riddles and tricky bits, 'cept the Nobles. Now, there's some straight talkers." —Joskun, An-Havva Constable

card.name: Feast of the Unicorn
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +4/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some delicacies are not to be savored, save by the callous." —Baron Sengir

card.name: Feast of the Unicorn
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +4/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Could there be a fouler act? No doubt the Baron knows of one." —Autumn Willow

card.name: Feroz's Ban
card.property: Creature spells cost {2} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Without the protection of Feroz's Ban, I fear the Homelands are lost." —Daria

card.name: Folk of An-Havva
card.property: Whenever Folk of An-Havva blocks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are those who accept being told what to do, what to think, and what to say. Then there are the Folk of An-Havva." —Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

card.name: Folk of An-Havva
card.property: Whenever Folk of An-Havva blocks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This town's only for good folk. The rest can go to the city." —Joskun, An-Havva Constable

card.name: Forget
card.property: Target player discards two cards, then draws as many cards as he or she discarded this way.

card.name: Funeral March
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, its controller sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This party is such fun—but it's a shame to mourn just one." —Irini Sengir

card.name: Ghost Hounds
card.property: Vigilance Whenever Ghost Hounds blocks or becomes blocked by a white creature, Ghost Hounds gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Giant Albatross
card.property: Flying When Giant Albatross dies, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, for each creature that dealt damage to Giant Albatross this turn, destroy that creature unless its controller pays 2 life. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

card.name: Giant Albatross
card.property: Flying When Giant Albatross dies, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, for each creature that dealt damage to Giant Albatross this turn, destroy that creature unless its controller pays 2 life. A creature destroyed this way can't be regenerated.

card.name: Giant Oyster
card.property: You may choose not to untap Giant Oyster during your untap step. {T}: For as long as Giant Oyster remains tapped, target tapped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step, and at the beginning of each of your draw steps, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature. When Giant Oyster leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, remove all -1/-1 counters from the creature.

card.name: Grandmother Sengir
card.property: {1} {B}, {T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rarely have power and madness been so delightfully wed as they have in our dear Grandmother." —Baron Sengir

card.name: Greater Werewolf
card.property: At end of combat, put a -0/-2 counter on each creature blocking or blocked by Greater Werewolf.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wolf-things are no mere beasts, but the lieutenants of the Baron." —Taysir

card.name: Hazduhr the Abbot
card.property: {X}, {T}: The next X damage that would be dealt this turn to target white creature you control is dealt to Hazduhr the Abbot instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soon, Serra will return and choose the Abbot's successor, else we are lost." —Gulsen, Abbey Matron

card.name: Headstone
card.property: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your headstone is the last page in the book of your life." —Murat, Death Speaker

card.name: Heart Wolf
card.property: First strike {T}: Target Dwarf creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. When that creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Heart Wolf. Activate this ability only during combat.

card.name: Hungry Mist
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Hungry Mist unless you pay {G}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the air must feed, let it take the self-righteous." —Murat, Death Speaker

card.name: Hungry Mist
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Hungry Mist unless you pay {G}{G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All things must eat, after all. Even the air can hunger." —Gemma, Willow Priestess

card.name: Ihsan's Shade
card.property: Protection from white

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ihsan, the weak. Ihsan, the fallen. Ihsan, the betrayer. He has brought shame to the Serra Paladins where none existed before. May his suffering equal his betrayal." —Baris, Serra Inquisitor

card.name: Irini Sengir
card.property: Green enchantment spells and white enchantment spells cost {2} more to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That cruel being brings shame to all her fellow Dwarves and misery to all the land. She is Sengir's daughter in spirit if not in blood." —Reveka, Wizard Savant

card.name: Ironclaw Curse
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -0/-1. Enchanted creature can't block creatures with power equal to or greater than the enchanted creature's toughness.

card.name: Jinx
card.property: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What wizards upset, the land soon rights." —Gemma, Willow Priestess

card.name: Joven

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Joven, you're almost as good a thief as I. But Eron hates you even more." —Chandler

card.name: Joven's Ferrets
card.property: Whenever Joven's Ferrets attacks, it gets +0/+2 until end of turn. At end of combat, tap all creatures that blocked Joven's Ferrets this turn. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

card.name: Joven's Tools
card.property: {4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn except by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If that thief Joven ever shows his head around here again, make sure he leaves without it." —Eron the Relentless

card.name: Koskun Falls
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Koskun Falls unless you tap an untapped creature you control. Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.

card.name: Koskun Keep
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Treachery and anarchy make poor partners.

card.name: Labyrinth Minotaur
card.property: Whenever Labyrinth Minotaur blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Legend says they got a treasure cave, but it don't say where to find it." —Zeki, Reef Pirate

card.name: Labyrinth Minotaur
card.property: Whenever Labyrinth Minotaur blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I doubt any Labyrinth Minotaurs still live—but then again, we Minotaurs are stubborn beings." —Onatah, Anaba Shaman

card.name: Leaping Lizard
card.property: {1} {G}: Leaping Lizard gets -0/-1 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never question the Autumn Willow about her motives, not even when she turns people into Lizards. It's her way." —Devin, Faerie Noble

card.name: Leeches
card.property: Target player loses all poison counters. Leeches deals that much damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where our potions and powders fail, perhaps nature will succeed." —Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

card.name: Mammoth Harness
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature loses flying. Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, the other creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Marjhan
card.property: Marjhan doesn't untap during your untap step. {U}{U}, Sacrifice a creature: Untap Marjhan. Activate this ability only during your upkeep. Marjhan can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {U}{U}: Marjhan gets -1/-0 until end of turn and deals 1 damage to target attacking creature without flying. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Marjhan.

card.name: Memory Lapse
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Um . . . oh . . . what was I saying?" —Reveka, Wizard Savant

card.name: Memory Lapse
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh, I had a conscience once. But alas, I seem to have forgotten where I put it." —Chandler

card.name: Merchant Scroll
card.property: Search your library for a blue instant card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no trade without trust." —Eron, the Relentless

card.name: Mesa Falcon
card.property: Flying {1}{W}: Mesa Falcon gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The faith of Serra is borne on wings of hope." —Gulsen, Abbey Matron

card.name: Mesa Falcon
card.property: Flying {1}{W}: Mesa Falcon gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pretty Falcon, friend to Soraya. Will you send her my greetings?" —Gemma, Willow Priestess

card.name: Mystic Decree
card.property: All creatures lose flying and islandwalk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Curse Reveka, and curse her coddled conjurers. Their sorcerers' school shall yet be ours." —Irini Sengir

card.name: Narwhal
card.property: First strike, protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who needs a spear? Ya break off the horn, and ya stab the fish with it. Easy!" —Kakra, Sea Troll

card.name: Orcish Mine
card.property: Enchant land Orcish Mine enters the battlefield with three ore counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep or whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, remove an ore counter from Orcish Mine. When the last ore counter is removed from Orcish Mine, destroy enchanted land and Orcish Mine deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

card.name: Primal Order
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Primal Order deals damage to that player equal to the number of nonbasic lands he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's strange, but I can feel it when the land is corrupted. I understand why the Autumn Willow is so protective." —Daria

card.name: Prophecy
card.property: Reveal the top card of target opponent's library. If it's a land, you gain 1 life. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Rashka the Slayer
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Rashka the Slayer blocks one or more black creatures, Rashka gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rarely be the prey so haughty as to hunt the hunter." —Baron Sengir

card.name: Reef Pirates
card.property: Whenever Reef Pirates deals damage to an opponent, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Zeki sails with a dead crew not out of villainy, but pragmatism." —Baron Sengir

card.name: Reef Pirates
card.property: Whenever Reef Pirates deals damage to an opponent, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Corpses for crew don't sit well with me. Zeki and his dead ship had best keep their distance." —Joskun, An-Havva Constable

card.name: Renewal
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Renewal, sacrifice a land. Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Retribution
card.property: Choose two target creatures an opponent controls. That player chooses and sacrifices one of those creatures. Put a -1/-1 counter on the other.

card.name: Reveka, Wizard Savant
card.property: {T}: Reveka, Wizard Savant deals 2 damage to target creature or player and doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's nice to see a sister Dwarf in a position of such power, but why'd it have to be one of those seafaring muleheads?" —Halina, Dwarven Trader

card.name: Root Spider
card.property: Whenever Root Spider blocks, it gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're not half as fierce if they don't see you coming." —Devin, Faerie Noble

card.name: Roots
card.property: Enchant creature without flying When Roots enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That which nourishes can also bind." —Gemma, Willow Priestess

card.name: Roterothopter
card.property: Flying {2}: Roterothopter gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Roterothopter is as insidious as it is ingenious. It is one of the few creations of our school that I take no pride in." —Baki, Wizard Attendant

card.name: Rysorian Badger
card.property: Whenever Rysorian Badger attacks and isn't blocked, you may exile up to two target creature cards from defending player's graveyard. If you do, you gain 1 life for each card exiled this way and Rysorian Badger assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Samite Alchemist
card.property: {W} {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control. Tap that creature. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Powders and potions are nothing compared to faith." —Baris, Serra Inquisitor

card.name: Samite Alchemist
card.property: {W} {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control. Tap that creature. It doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wisest of Aysen dwell not in the Abbey, but in the laboratory." —Taysir

card.name: Sea Sprite
card.property: Flying, protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one can catch what won't be caught." —Kakra, Sea Troll

card.name: Sea Troll
card.property: {U}: Regenerate Sea Troll. Activate this ability only if Sea Troll blocked or was blocked by a blue creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've seen those Trolls devour a drowning sailor faster than his lungs could fill with water." —Zeki, Reef Pirate

card.name: Sengir Autocrat
card.property: When Sengir Autocrat enters the battlefield, create three 0/1 black Serf creature tokens. When Sengir Autocrat leaves the battlefield, exile all Serf tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A thankless job, and a death sentence besides." —Eron the Relentless

card.name: Sengir Bats
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Bats this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Bats.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the face of every one I see the Baron." —Daria

card.name: Sengir Bats
card.property: Flying Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Bats this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Bats.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are the eyes of the Baron, and they know your fears." —Ihsan's Shade

card.name: Serra Aviary
card.property: Creatures with flying get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Serra, like Feroz, is long since dead. But remember, Daria: her spirit shall survive so long as the Homelands do." —Taysir

card.name: Serra Bestiary
card.property: Enchant creature At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Serra Bestiary unless you pay {W}{W}. Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities with {T} in their costs can't be activated.

card.name: Serra Inquisitors
card.property: Whenever Serra Inquisitors blocks or becomes blocked by one or more black creatures, Serra Inquisitors gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Serra Paladin
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. {1}{W}{W}, {T}: Target creature gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Would that I could be a Paladin again, but the dead hold no place among their ranks." —Ihsan's Shade

card.name: Serrated Arrows
card.property: Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it. {T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Shrink
card.property: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not fear adversity. Let your courage be your strength." —Onatah, Anaba Shaman

card.name: Shrink
card.property: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The smallest beast can yet have the greatest heart." —Gemma, Willow Priestess

card.name: Soraya the Falconer
card.property: Bird creatures get +1/+1. {1}{W}: Target Bird creature gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soraya speaks with the hunters of the air, as do all of her family line." —Autumn Willow

card.name: Spectral Bears
card.property: Whenever Spectral Bears attacks, if defending player controls no black nontoken permanents, it doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hear there are Bears—or spirits—that guard caravans passing through the forest." —Gulsen, Abbey Matron

card.name: Timmerian Fiends
card.property: Remove Timmerian Fiends from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante. {B}{B}{B}, Sacrifice Timmerian Fiends: The owner of target artifact may ante the top card of his or her library. If that player doesn't, exchange ownership of that artifact and Timmerian Fiends. Put the artifact card into your graveyard and Timmerian Fiends from anywhere into that player's graveyard. This change in ownership is permanent.

card.name: Torture
card.property: Enchant creature {1}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh, they scream, right enough, and plead, too—but the Baron keeps no mercy in his vault of horrors." —Zeki, Reef Pirate

card.name: Torture
card.property: Enchant creature {1}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It helps you pass the time until you die." —Grandmother Sengir

card.name: Trade Caravan
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a currency counter on Trade Caravan. Remove two currency counters from Trade Caravan: Untap target basic land. Activate this ability only during an opponent's upkeep.

card.name: Trade Caravan
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a currency counter on Trade Caravan. Remove two currency counters from Trade Caravan: Untap target basic land. Activate this ability only during an opponent's upkeep.

card.name: Truce
card.property: Each player may draw up to two cards. For each card less than two a player draws this way, that player gains 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The people of Aysen feed us, and we don't kill them. That's my kind of truce." —Eron the Relentless

card.name: Veldrane of Sengir

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Poor, foolish Veldrane. He goes wherever the Baron wills him. One day, he'll go to die." —Halina, Dwarven Trader

card.name: Wall of Kelp
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {U}{U}, {T}: Create a 0/1 blue Plant Wall creature token with defender named Kelp.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ya can eat it or ya can weave it, but ya can't fight in it." —Zeki, Reef Pirate

card.name: Willow Faerie
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Autumn Willow cannot be everywhere at once—that's what her grandchildren are for." —Gulsen, Abbey Matron

card.name: Willow Faerie
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Swift as the wind and harder to catch— that's the Faeries for you." —Daria

card.name: Willow Priestess
card.property: {T}: You may put a Faerie permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield. {2}{G}: Target green creature gains protection from black until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those of faith are those of strength." —Autumn Willow

card.name: Winter Sky
card.property: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Winter Sky deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. If you lose the flip, each player draws a card.

card.name: Wizards' School
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The legacy of Feroz lives on.
